name: Adv. Dr. Ravi G. Deshmukh
academic: Ph.D. (Rural Electrification), MBA (Power), M-Tech, Accredited Energy Auditor
experience: 24 Years (Technolegal, Regulatory & Electrical Expert, Energy & Power Sector)
publications: Research paper on Optimization of Rural Electrification Methods 'a comparative analysis of Grid Extension vs. Distributed generation' is published in the Proceedings of Advance Energy Research Conference held in December 2006 at 11T Bombay. The Same Paper is selected by international journal 'Energy for Sustainable Development'.
Research Paper on 'Modelling of Power loss in Joints of Power Distribution Systems' primed for Prayas (Energy Group) Pune.
A technical write up on 'Rural Electrification - an overview' published in April issue of e- magazine of Maha discom.
Thesis submitted to Amravati University towards,  Rural Electrification and economics.

name: Adv. Muktai Bhagwat
